verbs.description: After [ARG0: a federal judge] [V: ruled] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARG1: that the administration of President Donald Trump ca n't halt grants to Philadelphia over its " sanctuary city " status for illegal immigrants] , Philly 's far - left mayor did exactly what you might expect ... kinda . Yes , Mayor Jim Kenney broke out in a little song and dance with his chief of staff , letting loose with " [ we ] are a sanctuary city , yeah ! " https://twitter.com/StevePrest/status/1004406985343848448 More from The Associated Press on the ruling : U.S. District Judge Michael Baylson said in his ruling that the conditions the federal government placed on the city in order to receive the funding are unconstitutional , " arbitrary and capricious . " He also wrote that Philadelphia 's policies are reasonable and appropriate . Philadelphia has said it will turn over immigrants to Immigration and Customs Enforcement only if the agency has a warrant signed by a judge . The federal requirements included allowing Immigration and Customs Enforcement officers access to prisons to interview people of interest , providing advanced notice …
